#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
typedef long long ll;
ll pow(ll n,ll p)
{
    ll temp;
    if(p==0)
        return 1;
    temp=pow(n,p/2);
    if(p%2==0)
        return temp*temp;
    else
        return n*temp*temp;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,p,ans,k,ans1;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&p);
        k=ll(log2(n));
        ans=(2*(n-pow(2,k))+1);
        ans1=ans+p-1;
        if(ans1>n)
            ans1=ans1-n;
        printf("%lld\n",ans1);
    }
    return 0;
}
